trans-unit.source: Determines whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions should be granted to it.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et program skal kjøres, og hvilke sett med tillatelser bør gis til den.

trans-unit.source: Trust managers must implement the IApplicationTrustManager interface.
trans-unit.target: Stoler lederne må implementere grensesnittet IApplicationTrustManager.

trans-unit.source: The host calls the <xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether an application should be executed and which permissions should be granted to the application.
trans-unit.target: Vert-kall i <xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å finne ut om et program skal kjøres, og hvilke tillatelser bør gis til programmet.</xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later, there is only one trust manager, which can be a custom implementation of the IApplicationTrustManager interface.
trans-unit.target: I de [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] og nyere, vises bare én klarering manager, som kan være en egendefinert implementering av grensesnittet IApplicationTrustManager.

trans-unit.source: The default trust manager implementation prompts the user for permission to install the application and to elevate the permissions granted to the application.
trans-unit.target: Standard klarering manager implementering ber brukeren om tillatelse til å installere programmet og utvide rettighetene til programmet.

trans-unit.source: Other trust manager implementations might provide different user experiences.
trans-unit.target: Andre klarering manager implementeringer kan angi opplevelser annen bruker.

trans-unit.source: For example, an implementation might check an enterprise list for trusted applications instead of prompting the user for that information.
trans-unit.target: Implementering kan for eksempel se en liste over enterprise for klarerte programmer i stedet for ber brukeren om at informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions should be granted to it.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et program skal kjøres, og hvilke sett med tillatelser bør gis til den.

trans-unit.source: The DetermineApplicationTrust method is called by the host to determine whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions it should be granted.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DetermineApplicationTrust kalles av verten som bestemmer om et program skal kjøres, og hvilket sett med tillatelser den bør gis.

trans-unit.source: DetermineApplicationTrust returns an <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object with a <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.DefaultGrantSet%2A> property that contains a permission set representing the permissions to be granted to each assembly executing within the context of the application.
trans-unit.target: DetermineApplicationTrust returnerer en <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objekt med en <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.DefaultGrantSet%2A>egenskapen som inneholder en tillatelse angis som representerer tillatelse til å gis til hver samlingen kjøres i konteksten for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.DefaultGrantSet%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: The granted permissions do not apply to assemblies in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsene som er gitt gjelder ikke for samlinger i den globale samlingsbufferen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object also has an <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.IsApplicationTrustedToRun%2A> property that the trust manager sets to indicate whether the application should be trusted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objektet har også en <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.IsApplicationTrustedToRun%2A>egenskapen transportbehandling klarering angir som viser om programmet skal være klarerte.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.IsApplicationTrustedToRun%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: If the trust manager indicates that the application can be trusted, the host activates the application and grants its assemblies the set of permissions provided in the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis transportbehandling klarering indikerer at programmet er klarert, verten aktiverer programmet og gir samlingene sett med tillatelser som er angitt i den <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>samlingen.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: The activation context for the application.
The trust manager context for the application.
An object that contains security decisions about the application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder sikkerhet beslutninger om applikasjonen.
